column1: Smoque BBQ////Off the chart good.  My son had 1/2 rack baby back platter and I had the RIb Combo platter which  is1/2 baby back
column2: 1/2 St. Louis.   We ended up spllitting the St. Louis which was a perfect amount of food for lunch.  Sides were cole slaw
column3: beans and fries.  The meat was incredible
column4: juicy and just slid off the bone.  So good. Would recommend getting there by 11:30 am for lunch to beat the lines.
